system.requirements:
Headhunter Alternative Advance, 500xp
Perception 35+, Sure Strike or Deadeye Shot
system.effect: When the Character makes a Called Shot Action and achieves more Degrees of Success than the Target's Agility Bonus, they immediately inflict 1d5 Critical Damage on the location hit.

description.value: When the Character makes a Called Shot Action and achieves more Degrees of Success than the Target's Agility Bonus, they immediately inflict 1d5 Critical Damage on the location hit.
